Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 25th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 2006...
Injured on 4/27/2006 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to Baltimore on 3/2/2007 (Going to BAL: P J. Chamberlain, P B. Colon. Going to LAN: P M. Clement, P B. Chouinard, SS F. Tatis, 2B P. Polanco)...
Injured on 6/17/2010 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/14/2012...
Traded from Baltimore to St. Louis on 2/8/2014 (Going to STL: P J. Chamberlain. Going to BAL: 3B C. Headley)...
Had first career hit on 8/30/2014, off Mike Minor (COL)...
Traded from St. Louis to Detroit on 1/31/2016 (Going to STL: P J. White, SS C. Nix. Going to DET: P J. Chamberlain, P W. Chen)...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Injured on 7/2/2019 with a Broken Finger, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/15/2020 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/1/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $5,125,000 per year...
